Service Details: Offers physiotherapy services that include: manual physical therapy, manipulation of spinal and peripheral joints, therapeutic exercise, IMS / Dry Needling, vestibular rehabilitation, bike fitting, massage therapy, knee bracing, soft tissue mobilization, sports rehabilitation, taping, electrotherapy, traction, postural and ergonomic advice, core stability training / gym ball exercise
